segments.text: What are you doing now , Steven ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I am reading a book about money management .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , my God . Do you want to be a millionaire ? I can see you are very crazy about money .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Everyone wants to earn a lot of money . Don't you think so ? What's more , I am interested in money management .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , you are wrong . Money can't buy happiness and health . I won't sacrifice my health in order to get money . In other words , I don't want to be a millionaire and I want to have more free time to enjoy life .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , I see . But a proverb says " Money makes the mare go . " I think it will be better if you have more money .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Maybe you are right . Please take care of yourself when you make money . Anyway health is the most important thing .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you for your caring . I will .
segments.speaker: S2
